message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product today. Given its exceptional quality and high demand, I'm sure you'll find our price of $14000 quite reasonable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I was looking to spend no more than $6000. Would you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in our product. I understand your budget, but given the value and demand for our product, I'm able to offer you $11000. I believe this will be more suitable for your budget. I'm confident that you won't find a better product at this price.
I understand your position, Alice. However, I am looking to spend no more than $7000. Can we settle at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I'm willing to lower my price to $10000. This is a great deal for a product of this caliber. I believe this will be more suitable for your budget. What do you think?
